name: Morescape
tag_list: rich-media, music, web-development, software, video, technology, india, antara, sanjoy, salil-chowdhury, hospitality, commerce, production, pr, marketing, publicity, web-2-0, web-3-0, new-york, new-jersey
overview: Morescape Inc, is an emerging leader in digital web media production realm. The firm provides technical and strategic consulting services to businesses for applications in the e-commerce, mobile, telephony & collaboration areas including applications in the realm of web 2.0, music production, short films, brand development, guidance with production and legal processes and building out technology solutions with social media resources. Its businesses also include Morescape Records, an independent music label based in India and the United States featuring a diverse set of artists, Morescape Hospitality Marketing, a leader in interactive restaurant and hospitality marketing realm, as well as a network of interest based blogs in the fashion, lifestyle, and technology spaces.
